name: Condurango

Stomach: Painful affections of the stomach; ulceration
Vomiting of food, and indurations in left hypochondrium with constant burning pain
Stricture of oesophagus, with burning pains behind sternum, where food seems to stick
Vomiting of food and indurations, constant burning pain
Skin: Fissures form about the mucocutaneous outlets
Ulcerative stage of carcinoma cutis when fissures form

details: Stimulates the digestive functions and thus improves the general health. Allays the pain in gastralgia accompanying cancer of stomach. Modifies secretions of digestive glands. Varicose ulcers. Lupus. PAINFUL CRACKS IN CORNER OF MOUTH is a guiding symptom of this drug. Chronic gastric catarrh, syphilis, and cancer. Tumors; stricture of oesophagus. The active principle (CONDURANGIN) produces locomotor ataxia.
dosage: Tincture, or bark, 5-grain doses before meals in water. Also the thirtieth potency, in tumors.
